messsages.name: prophetess
messsages.text: talk.01

messsages.name: default_player
messsages.text: talk.02

messsages.name: prophetess
messsages.text: Tinuvel, a prophetess. I've seen the vision of you leading this city to a prosperous future.

messsages.name: default_player
messsages.text: What the hell? I'm just a passerby. I'm not even sure if I can get a place to stay in this town tonight!

messsages.name: prophetess
messsages.text: The lord here was just killed by gangsters, and now the town is in complete chaos.

messsages.name: prophetess
messsages.text: I will provide for your basic needs, but in exchange, you are required to take up the mantle of responsibility. I will guide you as you need.

messsages.name: default_player
messsages.text: Well, sounds not bad. So what should I do now?

messsages.name: prophetess
messsages.text: See the gangsters over there? GET RID OF THE GANGSTERS!
You need to GET RID OF THE GANGSTERS!

messsages.name: doomsdayGangSpy
messsages.text: Wow! A new face!

messsages.name: default_player
messsages.text: And who the hell are you?

messsages.name: doomsdayGangSpy
messsages.text: Just a survivor in this disaster. And you?

messsages.name: default_player
messsages.text: I made a deal with a prophetess and am going to repel the gangsters over there. You wanna help me? You'll get your share of rewards.

messsages.name: doomsdayGangSpy
messsages.text: Hahaha, the prophetess? Called Tinuvel?

messsages.name: default_player
messsages.text: ...You know her?

messsages.name: doomsdayGangSpy
messsages.text: A prophetess alone without even one follower? Come on! She's just a selfish priestess.

messsages.name: default_player
messsages.text: So...I was tricked by her?

messsages.name: doomsdayGangSpy
messsages.text: Of Course, dude. But you are not the only one. we are also pawns in her plan.

messsages.name: doomsdayGangSpy
messsages.text: It's not too late to wake up now. As long as you can KILL THAT PROPHETESS... I think our cooperation will be much more trustworthy.
KILL THE PROPHETES and cooperate with doomsdayGang?

messsages.name: default_player
messsages.text: Nice scenery, isn't it?

messsages.name: hunter
messsages.text: Maybe. But it will be even better when the herd runs by.

messsages.name: default_player
messsages.text: Sounds like you are experienced. Do you need help?

messsages.name: hunter
messsages.text: If you want...Come on then!

messsages.name: hunter
messsages.text: HUNT THE HERD before they run away. Confident?
Are you confident to HUNT THE HERD before they run away?

messsages.name: default_player
messsages.text: Tinuvel, honestly, I don't know whether I can trust you.

messsages.name: prophetess
messsages.text: I expect that. You don't need my guidance. You can rely on yourself.

messsages.name: default_player
messsages.text: But how?

messsages.name: prophetess
messsages.text: See that ruin? It was left by last lord.

messsages.name: prophetess
messsages.text: EXPLORE THE RUIN and show us that you are the chosen one.
EXPLORE THE RUIN and show something to the prophetess

messsages.name: secretGuard
messsages.text: Who are you...(Saw the token of the lord)

messsages.name: secretGuard
messsages.text: Well...You must be the new lord. Please command me if you need!

messsages.name: default_player
messsages.text: REPEL THE GANGSTERS outside the town!

messsages.name: secretGuard
messsages.text: Yes, sir!
The secretGuard is going to REPEL THE GANGSTERS outside the town!

messsages.name: default_player
messsages.text: Tinuvel, the big one is coming. Any idea?

messsages.name: prophetess
messsages.text: I've already prepared for it.

messsages.name: prophetess
messsages.text: There is a stronghold there, where you can AMBUSH THEM.
You are going to AMBUSH THE BIG TEAM.

messsages.name: doomsdayGangBigTeam
messsages.text: Lucky guy, we're not going to kill you.

messsages.name: doomsdayGangBigTeam
messsages.text: But you will act as our agent and TAKE OVER THE TOWN.

messsages.name: doomsdayGangBigTeam
messsages.text: OK?
Are you going to cooperate with the gang or fight with them?

messsages.name: artisan
messsages.text: The town was ransacked by those bastards.

messsages.name: artisan
messsages.text: You may be the one to save us and recuperate the town.

messsages.name: artisan
messsages.text: We need some material reserves. Try to EXPLORE RESOURCES FOR 3 TIMES and BRING THEM BACK TO ME.
Will you help them EXPLORE RESOURCES FOR 3 TIMES?

messsages.name: prophetess
messsages.text: The right token.

messsages.name: prophetess
messsages.text: All right. You are indeed qualified TO BE THE LORD.

messsages.name: prophetess
messsages.text: Go ahead, there's a lot of things waiting for you.

messsages.name: artisan
messsages.text: You've been a great help. Thank you very much.

messsages.name: artisan
messsages.text: Now we need to BUILD UP THE HOUSE in the town. Can you give us a hand?
